elements.name: question1
elements.title: What is the aim of advertising?
elements.correctAnswer: The main aim of advertising is to sell products or services, i.e. to generate sales.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Name the tasks of advertising.
elements.correctAnswer:
Make the product/service known. 
Explain possible uses and features. 
Describe the advantages to consumers. 
Put the company and all its services in the spotlight.
